title: Things To Do In London In Last Summer week 24 - 31 August
text:
| August 28, 2015 
ed every year in the last week of August month with some of the most popular band playing. Organized every year in the Clapham Common, this event marks the end of the weeklong summer vacations in London.

’s Park and holds plays and showcases movies which have been un-surpassingly famous. So, this summer take popcorn and beer, head towards this park and enjoy the classic plays of Shakespeare and classic movies.
